revised_title: Magnetic Character of the Iron-Built Armour-Plated Battery Pervenetz of the Imperial Russian Navy
tldr: Captain J. Belavenetz investigates the magnetic properties of the iron-built armour-plated ship 'Pervenetz' of the Imperial Russian Navy, focusing on the impact of the ship's magnetism on compass readings. He observes significant magnetic deviations and provides recommendations for the best placement of the compass and improvements to minimize heeling errors.
